Articles.Content:
Summary:

I'm looking for mods or out of game utilities similar to Kronal Vessel Viewer.

Additional information:

I'm looking to do trading card or TTA style write ups on my craft. If I feel ambitious maybe even blueprints for them.

I know KVV can do it. But it is a lot of clicks to do the top, left, front, (rear, bottom,), orthogonal views. I'm wondering if there are any other recommendations.
